info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:54PM EDT until August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR LIVINGSTON AND NORTHWESTERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 553 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brighton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hartland around 605 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Plainfield, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Conway Township, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Hudson Mills, Parkers Corners, Lakeland, Lyndon Township, Chilson and Unadilla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
